name: Driver Zach
notes: Promotion Match trainer for Rank Z

name: Office Worker Yvon
notes: Promotion Match trainer for Rank Y

name: Grade-Schooler Xavi
notes: Promotion Match trainer for Rank X

name: Waiter Rintaro
notes: Promotion Match trainer for Rank V - Uses the elemental monkey trio with Protect as Plus Move

name: Vinnie
notes: First trainer with a Mega Evolution (Mega Drampa). Defeating Vinnie promotes player from Rank W to Rank F. Located at Quasartico Inc. in Magenta District during Mission 10: The Secrets of Mega Evolution.

name: Canari
notes: Second trainer listed as Rank F - possible duplicate or Vinnie may have different rank

name: Naveen
notes: Team MZ member encountered at the Hotel during Reaching Rank E mission.

name: Mani
notes: DYN4MO member encountered at Electrical Substation during Quiz Round 3.

name: Tarragon
notes: DYN4MO member encountered at Racine Construction. Ground-type specialist.

name: Ivor
notes: Promotion Match trainer for Rank E - Fist of Justice organization member specializing in Fighting-types

name: Taunie/Urbain

party.condition: If player chose Grass or Fire starter
If player chose Fire or Water starter

notes: Team MZ rematch. Team varies based on player's starter choice: always has 2 of the 3 starters (countering player's choice) + Manectric. Party includes all 4 possible Pokemon with conditions.

name: Corbeau
notes: Promotion Match trainer for Rank D - Rust Syndicate organization member. Scolipede holds Scolipite (Mega Stone).

name: Gwynn
notes: Fist of Justice member during Rank D progression. Ghost-type specialist.

name: Jacinthe
notes: Promotion Match trainer for Rank C - SBC organization member. Clefable holds Clefablite (Mega Stone).

name: Grisham
notes: Promotion Match trainer for Rank B - Team Flare Nouveau member. Charizard holds Charizardite X (Mega Stone).

name: Lebanne
notes: SBC (Société Battle Club) member. First battle in Rank B tournament. Dragon-type specialist.

name: Canari
notes: DYN4MO tournament battle in Rank B. Third encounter with Canari. Electric-type specialist with two Mega Evolution options.

name: Ivor
notes: Fist of Justice tournament battle in Rank B. Second encounter with Ivor. Fighting-type specialist.

name: Corbeau
notes: Rust Syndicate boss. Promotion match for Rank C. Poison-type specialist. After victory, Corbeau visits player's hotel and provides generous tip that clears remaining debt.

name: Jacinthe
notes: SBC (Société Battle Club) final boss in Rank B tournament. Fairy-type specialist with diverse coverage.

name: Urbain
notes: End-game Z-A Royale promotion match. Two of the Pokemon in his party are starters you didn't select (varies by player choice). Final Pokemon Mega Evolves into Mega Meganium.

name: Philippe
notes: Rust Syndicate member. Challenges player after grunts are defeated. Steel-type specialist team.

name: Detective Emma
notes: Reward Match trainer in Rank Infinity - Random encounter after Reward Match 20. Multiple Pokemon have Mega Evolution capability.
